body:
## Version information

Android Studio `3.4.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 38.1.1` • Dart plugin `183.6270`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

comment_data.body: I think this was address in https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/pull/3742; cc @kenzieschmoll .

title: Update failed for ActionGroup: null (null)[null]
